product_name: adidas Terrex Swift Half-Zip Shirt - Women's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: The secret power in the women's adidas Terrex Swift Half-Zip Shirt is natural Cocona(R) activated carbon; it manages moisture and odor, blocks UV rays and practically does the laundry for you. Cocona fibers are fused into the polyester fibers to improve overall wicking, breathability, warmth, odor absorption and UV protection. Cocona(R) fabrics are made with fibers from activated carbon from coconut shells salvaged from food and water filter industry waste. Higher fitted neck and fabric offer outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection. Wicks sweat off your skin and dries fast. The women's adidas Terrex Swift Half-Zip Shirt lets you easily vent excess heat. Overstock.
